Name: Elfen Lied
Hint: When innocence and darkness collide, a mysterious girl with extraordinary powers becomes the catalyst for a poignant tale of redemption, tragedy, and the unbreakable bonds of humanity.

Name: Fate Stay Night

Name: Tokyo Ghoul

Hint: Explore the bustling microcosm within, as tireless cells embark on a remarkable journey, battling pathogens and maintaining the delicate balance of life within the human body.
